root: ^Don Quixote: (attacking the roof of the ship with his lance) I'll break this damned spell.

c-0: ^You: How are you? I hope our last conversation was not too harsh on you.
^Don Quixote: I barely remember it. It was a full rotation ago. I'll defeat this magic spell and prove my knighthood.
c-1: ^You: Hey, what are you doing right now?
^Don Quixote: I am trying to defeat this evil magic force, so that I accomplish my knightly duty here.
g-0: ^You: I don't think a lance is going to cut it.
^Don Quixote: I am poking to see the nature of this spell, so I can come up with an anti-spell.
^Let me know if I can help

c-0: ^You: Even if you poke at it, I don't think you can work out what kind of magic it is.
^Don Quixote: That's becuase of your feeble brain, now leave me be!
c-1: ^You: I'll help in anyway I can, I guess.
^Don Quixote: Turn away, I can do this on my own. I am so much better an adventurer!
